column1: With the illicit amorous adventures of wives in the situation of the eternal triangle ( husband, wife, lover ) being the most common single dramatic type in the fabliaux, the most frequent type as the object of ridicule is the deceived husband, often not merely cuckolded but on occasion beaten or otherwise degraded or abused as well ; and what is more after all this sometimes so utterly deceived that he remains happy in the delusion that his wife has proved herself faithful to him.
